name: Wolfheart
description:
You're an elf cast out from your village for having "the bad kind of magic", the wolf is your only companion, you feed the wolf and it grows over the course of the game. The final game is intended explores themes of loneliness and rejection, of being treated differently for being who you are, and self-acceptance.

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Fire Bow

Right Mouse - Aim Bow

X - Command wolf to sit

C - Command wolf to follow

V - Command wolf to attack last target you attacked

E - Mount Wolf (please wait until the wolf is bigger, there is supposed to be a limitation on this but I ran out of time)

Main menu doesn't work well, needs two clicks to load for some reason.

Buggy as hell, but I hope someone finds it fun!
